Package com.gh.bmd.jrt.invocation

Classes and interfaces related to routine invocations.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Invocation<INPUT,OUTPUT>
    Interface defining a routine invocation.
    InvocationFactory<INPUT,OUTPUT>
    Invocation factory interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DelegatingInvocation<INPUT,OUTPUT>
    Invocation implementation delegating the execution to another routine.
    FilterInvocation<INPUT,OUTPUT>
    Abstract implementation of an invocation filtering each input and transforming it in output data.
    FunctionInvocation<INPUT,OUTPUT>
    This is a special abstract implementation that centralizes the routine invocation inside a single method, which gets called only when all the inputs are available.
    Invocations
    Utility class for creating invocation factory objects.
    Invocations.DefaultInvocationFactory<INPUT,OUTPUT>
    Default implementation of an invocation factory.
    PassingInvocation<DATA>
    Implementation of an invocation simply passing on the input data.
    ProcedureInvocation<OUTPUT>
    Abstract implementation of an invocation performing a procedure eventually returning output data.
    TemplateInvocation<INPUT,OUTPUT>
    Empty abstract implementation of a routine invocation.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvocationDeadlockException
    Exception indicating that no invocation instance became available before the specific timeout elapsed.
    InvocationException
    Exception wrapping any throwable escaping an invocation execution.
    InvocationInterruptedException
    Exception wrapping a thread interrupted exception caught inside a routine execution.

Package com.gh.bmd.jrt.invocation Description

Classes and interfaces related to routine invocations.

Created by davide-maestroni on 9/25/14.
